job_history.work_description: Complete the monthly financials for seven different medical groups. Reconcile all the bank statements for these groups which include ZBA accounts. Record all the general entries, payroll entries, transaction entries, month end and year end entries, reconcile the balance sheet and income statement accounts, and record the fixed assets and depreciation.
Directed staff of three and managed accounting, budgeting, HR, and administrative responsibilities at state-operated military academy providing education and life skills for at-risk youth.
Supervised five accounting staff preparing accounts payable and processing travel transactions for nine divisions within Department of Military and Veterans' Affairs.
Completed complex accounting adjustments involving three accounting systems. Created detailed spreadsheets due to complexity of adjustments as funds were divided among several parties and entities.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling monthly financials and reconciling bank statements across multiple medical groups, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience with all aspects of accounting including payroll, general entries, and asset management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll entries consistently for several years, suggesting a strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed budgeting responsibilities as an administrative assistant, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised multiple staff members in different roles, indicating a strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and payroll, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Accounting Supervision
skills.explanation: Supervised accounting staff and managed accounts payable, showing a strong proficiency in accounting supervision.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Completed complex accounting adjustments and created detailed spreadsheets, showing a solid working proficiency in financial analysis.
